title: High Dimensional Factor Analysis with Weak Factors
abstract: This paper studies the principal components (PC) estimator for high dimensional approximate factor models with weak factors in that the factor loading ($\boldsymbol{\Lambda}^0$) scales sublinearly in the number $N$ of cross-section units, i.e., $\boldsymbol{\Lambda}^{0\top} \boldsymbol{\Lambda}^0 / N^\alpha$ is positive definite in the limit for some $\alpha \in (0,1)$. While the consistency and asymptotic normality of these estimates are by now well known when the factors are strong, i.e., $\alpha=1$, the statistical properties for weak factors remain less explored. Here, we show that the PC estimator maintains consistency and asymptotical normality for any $\alpha\in(0,1)$, provided suitable conditions regarding the dependence structure in the noise are met. translated_title: 高维度下具有弱因子的因子分析
translated_abstract: 本文研究了具有弱因子的高维度近似因子模型的主成分(Principal Components, PC)估计器，其中因子载荷($\boldsymbol{\Lambda}^0$)在截面单元数$N$的数量上按亚线性比例缩放，即$\boldsymbol{\Lambda}^{0\top} \boldsymbol{\Lambda}^0 / N^\alpha$在极限时是正定的，这里$\alpha \in (0,1)$。尽管对于强因子，即$\alpha=1$，这些估计的一致性和渐近正态性已经广为人知，但对于弱因子的统计性质仍然较少探讨。在这里，我们证明了当满足噪声中依赖结构的适当条件时，PC估计器对于任何$\alpha \in (0,1)$都保持一致性和渐近正态性。这补充了Onatski (2012)的早期结果，该结果表明当$\alpha=0$时PC估计器是不一致的，并且补充了Bai和Ng (2023)的最新工作，他们在$\alpha \in (0,1)$时建立了PC估计器的渐近正态性。
tldr: 本文研究了具有弱因子的高维度因子模型，证明了主成分估计器在任何$0<\alpha<1$时都保持一致性和渐近正态性。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates high dimensional factor models with weak factors and shows that the principal components estimator maintains consistency and asymptotic normality for any $0<\alpha<1$.
